wikitext.*:
{{Seealso|Tolkien (disambiguation)}}
Over the couse of the years, many books and films about Tolkien have been called '''[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]''', either with or without a subtitle.

==Books==
* [[1969]]: [[J.R.R. Tolkien (by Catherine Stimpson)|''J.R.R. Tolkien'' (by Catherine Stimpson)]]
* [[1972]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers for the 70's)]]'' by [[Robley Evans]], in the ''Writers for the 70's'' series.
* [[1976]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Architect of Middle-earth]]'' by [[Daniel Grotta]].
* [[1977]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' by [[Humphrey Carpenter]].
* [[1981]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Shores of Middle-earth]]'' by [[Robert Giddings]] (ed.).
* [[1982]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Critical Biography]]'', by [[Deborah Rogers]] and Ivor Rogers.
* [[1982]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Modern Literature Series)]]'' by [[Katharyn Crabbe]], in the ''Modern Literature Series''.
* [[1983]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: This Far Land]]'' by [[Robert Giddings]] (ed.).
* [[1984]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Myth, Morality and Religion]]'' by [[Richard L. Purtill]].
* [[1988]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Hobbit Chronicler]]'' by [[Russell Shorto]].
* [[1989]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Man of Fantasy]]'' by [[Russell Shorto]].
* [[1992]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien, 1892-1992]]'', by [[Johan Vanhecke]]
* [[1992]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Descriptive Bibliography]]'' by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Douglas A. Anderson]].
* [[1992]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Master of Fantasy]]'' by [[David R. Collins]].
* [[1992]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Art of the Myth-maker]]'' by [[Carol D. Stevens]] and [[David Stevens]].
* [[1995]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Artist and Illustrator]]'' by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]].
* [[1997]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work)]]'' by [[Charles Moseley]], in the ''Writers & Their Work'' series.
* [[2001]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Author of the Century]]'' by [[Tom Shippey]].
* [[2001]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Man Who Created the Lord of the Rings]]'' by [[Michael Coren]]. 
* [[2002]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Beginner's Guide]]'' by [[Andrew Blake]].
* [[2003]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Library of Great Authors)]]'' by [[Stanley P. Baldwin]], in the ''Library of Great Authors'' series.
* [[2003]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography (Greenwood Biographies)]]'' by [[Leslie Ellen Jones]], in the ''Greenwood Biographies'' series.
* [[2011]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Holiday House)]]'', a children's book by Alexandra and John Wallner.
* [[2012]]: ''[[JRR Tolkien: The True Lord of the Rings]]'', a graphic novel.
* [[2013]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: the Forest and the City]]'', a collection of papers.
* [[2017]]: ''[[J. R. R. Tolkien (Routledge)]]'', a collection of scholarly works, edited by [[Stuart D. Lee]].
* [[2022]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Art of the Manuscript]]'', the catalog of the exhibition of the same name.

==Documentaries==
* [[1997]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (1997 documentary)]]'', a [[BBC]] documentary.
* [[2001]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Master of the Rings]]'', a documentary starring [[the Brothers Hildebrandt]].
* [[2001]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Origin of the Rings]]'', a documentary.
* [[2002]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Creator of Middle-Earth]]'', one of the extras on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|the extended edition of ''The Fellowship of the Ring'']].
* [[2003]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Origins of Middle-Earth]]'', one of the extras on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|the extended edition of ''The Two Towers'']].
* [[2004]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Legacy of Middle-Earth]]'', one of the extras on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|the extended edition of ''The Return of the King'']].
